skill.p1nero_ec.desc: §6Perfect Dodge§7 or §6Perfect Parry§7 to gain Skill Points
skill.p1nero_ec.ceraunus.desc1: Press %s to throw %s forward, consuming %d Skill Points
skill.p1nero_ec.ceraunus.desc2: Press %s to summon a sector-shaped wave forward, consuming %d Skill Points
skill.p1nero_ec.ceraunus.desc3: Press %s to leap forward, release lightning in all directions, and summon waves, consuming %d Skill Points
skill.p1nero_ec.soul_render.desc1: Press %s to dash forward, leaving phantom halberds along the path, consuming %d Skill Points
skill.p1nero_ec.soul_render.desc2: Press %s to slam the ground with force, dealing heavy damage and inflicting stun to surrounding entities, consuming %d Skill Points
skill.p1nero_ec.soul_render.desc3: Press %s to summon numerous phantom halberds around you, consuming %d Skill Points
skill.p1nero_ec.wrath_of_the_desert.desc: Press %s to shoot three sandstorm forward, consuming %d Skill Points
Press %s to shoot three cursed sandstorm forward, consuming %d Skill Points
Press %s to continuously shoot sandstorm forward, then summon Ancient Desert Steles to crash down around you, consuming %d Skill Points
skill.p1nero_ec.tidal_claw.desc2: Press %s to charge forward and launch %s, consuming %d skill points
skill.p1nero_ec.tidal_claw.desc3: Press %s to create %s at the feet of entities within a 10-meter radius, consuming %d skill points
